data.title: Mike Bryan Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Mike Bryan with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Plays doubles with twin brother Bob

With Bob, played for Stanford in 1997 and 1998, winning back-to-back NCAA Championships, and the doubles title in 1998

Turned pro in 1998

In 2005, the twins played in all four Grand Slam finals

The twins were named the ATP's Team of the Decade for 2000-09

Ranked as the world's No 1 doubles team for a record seventh time in 2011

Was fined $10,000 for unsportsmanlike behavior after a loss at the 2011 U

S

Open

Twins formed the Bryan Bros

Band, and released an album in 2009
